content.description: Source: Voyages: The Trans-Atlantic Slave Trade Database. http://www.slavevoyages.org. 2018.
content.question: Which of the following describes a trend shown in the graph of the regional distribution of the slave trade before the American Revolution?

choices.label: The northern colonies did not participate in the slave trade.
The slave trade to Virginia and Maryland increased.
Fewer enslaved Africans were brought to the southern colonies than to the northern colonies.
More enslaved Africans were brought to the Carolinas and Georgia than to Virginia and Maryland.

content.answer: More enslaved Africans were brought to the Carolinas and Georgia than to Virginia and Maryland.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
